original_definition: 'LED die' means a small block of light-emitting semiconducting material on which a functional LED circuit is fabricated;
generated_definition: 'LED die' means a single electric part comprising principally at least one led die, excluding control gear, parts of it, cap, active electronic components, and not connected directly to the mains voltage. may include optical elements, light converters, thermal, mechanical, and electric interfaces or parts to address electrostatic discharge concerns. any light-emitting devices intended to be used directly in an led luminaire are considered light sources.

Article 2: ‘LED die’ or ‘LED chip’ means a small block oflight-emitting semiconducting material on which a functional LED circuit is fabricated;

‘LED package’ means a single electric part comprising principally at least one LED die. It does not include a control gear or parts of it, a cap or active electronic components and is not connected directly to the mains voltage. It can include one or more of the following: optical elements, light converters (phosphors), thermal, mechanical and electric interfaces or parts to address electrostatic discharge concerns. Any light-emitting devices that are intended to be used directly in an LED luminaire, are considered to be light sources;
